value:
There you are! Er...wait. You're not
Navarre... Never mind!

I tend to attract scoundrels... I left
my group when our leader got too
flirty...and then bandits found me!

Oh no! Your jacket is inside out!
How embarrassing! ...Heehee! Only
joking! You should see your face!

Hmm... So you can summon all kinds
of Heroes, huh? Can you...choose
who you summon?

Navarre, the hero who saved me,
is incredibly strong! They even call
him...the Scarlet Sword! So cool!

Hm... Expecting a dance, were you?
Well, don't blame me when you're
bursting with energy afterward!

You're in my way! ...Oh, wow! I really
am becoming more and more like
Navarre. You think so too, right?!

Bet ya underestimated me because
I'm a dancer, right? Well, who's the
fool now, hm?

Hey... W-wait a minute... Something's
stuck... Ah! Oh no, it's come undone!

Ugh... I'm a dancer, y'know, so don't
expect me to be some great fighter!
...Thanks for thinking of me, though!

Hi, I'm Phina! I'm a dancer from
Warren—heard of it? My dances
are known for being energizing!

This world isn't bad, but being here
makes me realize how much I like
life in Archanea!$k$pOh, but I really appreciate you too!
You've been so helpful since I got
here, $Nu!$k$pI want to return the favor, so you
have to come visit Archanea after
all the fighting here is done, OK?!$k$pPromise? If you do, I'll show you
a special dance I haven't shown
anyone before...$k$pBut! You'll just have to wait for that!
Don't worry—I'll make sure you've
got the energy you need until then!
それっ
Please...!
きゃあっ！
That hurts...!
Here it comes!
How d'you like THIS?
Too busy ogling?
I've got what you need...
Navarre...
(giggle)
You think I'm cute!
Frills that flitter and flutter!
I'm Phina, a dancer from Warren.
Folks say my dancing renews the energy of whoever watches. I'm just that good!
One time I was attacked by a group of bandits, but...Navarre saved me!
I'll never give up on you, Navarre... Never!
Yeah, you look pretty good in the face, but...your fashion sense could use some work.
Oh yeah?
Hmm?
Just you watch!
